start of the loading dose, give 10 mg/kg in dextrose 
5% over 4 hours repeated every 8 hours until there is clinical improvement, and the 
patient can take oral therapy. 
• Monitor for hypoglycaemia and dysrhythmias at least 4 hourly. 
• If there is significant renal failure increase dose interval to 12 hourly after 48 hours. 
o Monitor: RR, Oxygen saturation, intake and output, blood glucose, UKE, FBC 
o Add broad-spectrum, antibiotics to cover secondary bacterial infections
